name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 11, Zhejiang Propaganda Department published an article: "Online public opinion cannot be simply deleted"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 10, netizens recorded the homeless people who slept on the ground every night at Huangqi Cultural Square in Foshan City, Guangdong Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Contribution by students from Xinyi No.1 Middle School

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens discovered that the lyrics of the "School Song" that we sang since elementary school have been changed from "When I grow up, I will make contributions to the people" to "When I grow up, I will make contributions to the motherland."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, a netizen forwarded the news of Moore Thread layoffs to Zhihu and received a threatening letter from Moore Thread’s legal department.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the Zhongzhi Group’s collapse
Summary of Zhongzhi Group investors’ protests across the country
